Title: Relates to prohibiting former assisted living residences from becoming migrant shelters
Summary: Relates to prohibiting former assisted living residences from closing in order to become shelters for asylum seekers.
LawCode: Amd ยง4653-a, Pub Health L; amd ยง43, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the social services law, in relation to prohibiting the establishment or operation of a shelter for asylum seekers on a property that was formerly operated as an assisted living residence
